SENT.plain: An identical amino acid substitution in fibroblast growth factor receptors (FGFR) 1, 2 and 3 occurs in patients with different craniosynostosis syndromes
We tested 113 patients with various craniosynostosis syndromes for the analogous Pro246Arg mutation in FGFR4 by a PCR-restriction enzyme assay
None of the patients displayed this change nor other mutations in the conserved linker region, as test by SSCP analysis
Mutations in this domain of FGFR4 are unlikely to contribute significantly to craniosynostosis in humans
